start.intro: Enter the IP address of your LG SmartTV.

start.Name: Name
start.required: IP address is a required value.
start.discovery: Searching for devices, one moment please
start.pairingdescription:
Turn on your television and click the 'Request pairing key' button. Fill in the code that appears on your television.
First try button v1, if that doesn't work please try button v2
